titleStmt.title: A proclamation against transportation of leather.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Westminster the one and thirtieth day of March, in the sixt yeere of our reigne ...
Revoking any patents for export of neat's leather or hides. Cf. STC.
Arms 10; Steele notation: louing curious 2) Leather seruice.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
